title: Grand Portage National Monument: Gas Station
body: Gas Station        Grand Portage SPUR Gas Station NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen       There are two locations to obtain gas in the Grand Portage area. Grand Portage Trading Post 77 Mile Creek Road Grand Portage, MN 55605 1-218-475-2282 The SPUR GAS station is located in front of the Trading Post Ryden’s Border Store 9301 Ryden Road Grand Portage, MN 55605 Phone: 218-475-2330
